content:
As an AI language model, I can not predict the future, but I can say that Johns Hopkins University has a history of innovation and is committed to maintaining that tradition in the future. The university has consistently ranked among the top research universities in the United States, and has been at the forefront of many research fields, particularly in medicine and public health. 

The university has also been at the forefront of innovation in online education, offering several online programs that allow students to take courses remotely from anywhere in the world. Also, the University has a robust office for technology transfer, which assists faculty and staff in bringing their innovations to the commercial marketplace.

Overall, the university's commitment to excellence, research, and innovation suggest that it will continue to be a leader in higher education and research in the future.
